system.description:
Grants special benefits against fire and creatures with an affinity for fire.

  • In extreme cold, casts light: 30’ radius.

  • Grants an attack bonus: +3 against fire-using or fire-dwelling creatures.

  • Can extinguish fire: [[/r 1d100]]{50%} chance of extinguishing a 10’ radius area when thrust into fire. This also affects magical fire (but not instantaneous effects).

  • Protects against fire: The wielder gains the following benefits:

    1. Normal fire: Unharmed by non-magical fire.
    2. Save bonus: Gain a +2 bonus to all saving throws versus fire-based magical or breath attacks.
    3. Fire-based damage: Is reduced by 1 point per damage die rolled. (Each die inflicts a minimum of 1 hit point damage.)
